summary:
Mod adds in game of the new companion -  Katriya. As you likely already noticed it a ghost. It is possible to find Katriya in Riften on a cemetery, from the very beginning of game. As it former "adventurer" read the thief. ) that can teach you to force locks if ask.

??? ????????? ? ???? ?????? ????????. ??? ??
descriptionHtml:
So. Mod adds in game of the new Companion -  Katrya. As you likely already noticed it a ghost. but it is cut very painfully. ) )
It is possible to find Katriya in Riftena, well if it a ghost that at night, in the afternoon it has a thirst and it comes into a tavern to drink after you will pass a quest "mislaid in Centuries".  for those, to a lump of "nevterpej" there is one more esp, will find, with it it will appear at once. 
Well naturally those who took at once Katriya, without having passed a quest at first, a crown won't receive. I think so it will be honest.
Well now details.
Russian postscoring full. on a skyrim, foloverwanderer2, UFO, minilovers. at whom isn't present - I recommend to establish foloverwanderer2 and UFO,
they are enclosed in archive in the directory of "dependensies".
Now about Katriya, she is a soldier, the Sword and the Board, but also very not bad handle with Bow. so that if it with you will always cover that
you from a back. If the purpose far it prefers to thrust in it an arrow another, however as well as I if that approaches will finish a sword.
As it former "adventurer" read the thief. ) that can teach you to force locks if ask.
Further. After quest passing on Dvemer ruins there is other Katriya. technically you too can make it the companion. she is dressed
on another. in light, and it too has weapon instead of that stuff that it designers was handed over.
the truth after you will pass a quest it as well as it is necessary will be gone. from the ends. well. if you liked this Katriya that you can her
to activate from the console, [img]http://content.foto.mail.ru/mail/gloomdaemon/293/h-297.jpg[/img] (to do this, you need load game at moment when she still here, and, open console by pushing "`". After that, target her by cursor, you see ID appear. After that, load game when she already gone, and better in place where she gone, so open console again, you still had target on her , so use "enable" command. thats all/) it will appear in the same place where disappeared and won't vanish more. There is a place it at the very beginning of a quest.
when you will find its corpse, it seems in Alkatramz. And so when she will tell you that found a place where conducts a door. and it is closed. have in view of what behind it is certain SOMEthings is. If you low level or bad equip check a katria backpack near body if you not do this early :o) and try ramm that door. you can die, can win, who knows :o) . but also buns there are the tasty. (if YOU are small still. I advise you descend in Riften for one more Katria, in 3th I think you will hanndle with that. ) I by the way didn't find as this door honestly
to open. but can to you it will be possible)
Further, Katriya is completely equipped. it has the unique sword and onions. it is dressed in an own set of armor. technically it is possible for its thing
to improve. also as well as other things which you can find in a skyrim. so gaze about) both the weapon and armor at it good.
maybe not top but also not junk stuff. any non-standard things and models Mod doesn't use.

1) establish the 2nd mod from / dependensies (or don't establish)
2) write down aGhFollover_Katria.bsa, aGhFollover_Katria.bsl, aGhFollover_Katria.esp in the game Data folder, activate aGhFollover_Katria.esp
loading Order: 
FollowerWander2.esp
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul.esp
UFO - Dawnguard AddOn.esp
UFO - Heartfire AddOn.esp
UFO - AllwaysDrawWeapons.esp
aGhFollover_Katria.esp

All this is desirable at the end of loading.
WELL it seems everything, you look , download also successful to you games.

P.S  you Will find flaws, punctures. there are offers or remarks will be corrected. In general this of mod, part of more volume mod which I yet didn't add. so in date files there can be something superfluous, or God forbid not suffice something - you will notice - write - it is remediable. gloomdaemon@mail.ru] 

Sincerely y ours Alex Gloomdaemon.
